title: Writing Equations 11a Constructed Response (NEW)
prompt:
A student's essay is 3 pages long. Page 1 contains M words. Page 2 contains 43 fewer words than page 1. Page 3 contains twice as many words as page 1.

Drag the formula you would use to complete this equation into the box at the right.
feedback:
<math>
 <mtable columnalign='left'>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtext>Write expressions for the number of words on each page, then </mtext>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtext>add them up:</mtext>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mrow></mrow>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtext>Page 1:</mtext><mtext>​</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mi>M</mi>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtext>Page 2:</mtext><mtext>​</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mi>M</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>43</mn>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtext>Page 1:</mtext><mtext>​</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mfrac>
     <mn>1</mn>
     <mn>3</mn>
    </mfrac>
    <mi>M</mi>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mrow></mrow>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtext>Number of words on all three pages: </mtext><mi>M</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo>
     <mrow>
      <mi>M</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>43</mn></mrow>
    <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo>
     <mn>2</mn>
    <mi>M</mi>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
 </mtable>
 
</math>
